SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.springdata.cassandra.mapping
Annotation Type KeyColumn

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
public @interface KeyColumn

Identifies partition key in the Cassandra composite primary key class. Annotated column is the part of the Cassandra Partition Key (former Row Id).

Author:
Alex Shvid

Required Element Summary
 KeyPart keyPart
          Key part of the primary key.
 int ordinal
          Order of the column in the primary key.
 
Optional Element Summary
 String name
          The name of the column in the table.
 Ordering ordering
          Ordering of the column in the table.
 

Element Detail

keyPart

public abstract KeyPart keyPart
Key part of the primary key.

Returns:

ordinal

public abstract int ordinal
Order of the column in the primary key.

Returns:

name

public abstract String name
The name of the column in the table.

Returns:
Default:
""

ordering

public abstract Ordering ordering
Ordering of the column in the table.

Returns:
Default:
org.springdata.cassandra.cql.core.Ordering.ASCENDING
